title: ff + leave = one less vote needed
body: I've just seen this and it's some of the dumbest spaghetti code I've seen, even for league. ffing then leaving means it only takes 3 votes to end the game.

replies.body: Do you mean that when three out of five vote yes and then one of the five leaves, the figure is then updated to three out of four, turning a failed vote into a successful one?
